refsect1.title: Object Hierarchy
refsect1.screen: GObject ╰── AgsRecall ├── AgsRecallAudioSignal ├── AgsRecallChannel ├── AgsRecallChannelRun ├── AgsRecallRecycling ├── AgsRecallAudio ├── AgsRecallAudioRun ├── AgsPlayAudioFile ├── AgsPlayNote ╰── AgsPlayPattern

refsect2.title: ags_recall_resolve_dependencies ()
refsect2.para: A signal indicating that the inheriting object should resolve it's dependencies.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_run_init_pre ()
refsect2.para: Prepare for run, this is the pre stage within the preparation.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_run_init_inter ()
refsect2.para: Prepare for run, this is the inter stage within the preparation.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_run_init_post ()
refsect2.para: Prepare for run, this is the post stage within the preparation.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_run_pre ()
refsect2.para: This is the pre stage within a run.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_run_inter ()
refsect2.para: This is the inter stage within a run.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_run_post ()
refsect2.para: This is the post stage within a run.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_stop_persistent ()
refsect2.para: Unsets the AGS_RECALL_PERSISTENT flag set and invokes ags_recall_done().

refsect2.title: ags_recall_done ()
refsect2.para: The AgsRecall doesn't want to run anymore, it has been done its work.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_cancel ()
refsect2.para: The AgsRecall doesn't want to run anymore, it aborts further execution.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_remove ()
refsect2.para: The AgsRecall will be removed immediately.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_duplicate ()
refsect2.para: Should duplicate an AgsRecall, so it can pass the runs. Mainly used for creating duplicates from templates, see AGS_RECALL_TEMPLATE.

entry.para: the properties to be passed for instantiating the AgsRecall

refsect2.title: ags_recall_notify_dependency ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_recall_notify_dependency (AgsRecall *recall, guint dependency, gint count);
refsect2.para: Notifies a recall that an other depends on it.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_add_dependency ()
refsect2.para: Associate a new dependency for this recall.

refsect2.title: ags_recall_get_by_effect ()
refsect2.para: Finds all matching effect and filename.

entry.para: the filename containing effect or NULL

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList, or NULL if not found

refsect2.title: ags_recall_find_type ()
refsect2.para: Finds next matching recall for type. Intended to be used as iteration function.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList containing recalls, or NULL if not found

refsect2.title: ags_recall_find_template ()
refsect2.para: Finds next template, see AGS_RECALL_TEMPLATE flag. Intended to be used as iteration function.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList containing recalls, or NULL if not found

refsect2.title: ags_recall_template_find_type ()
refsect2.para: Finds next matching recall for type which is a template, see AGS_RECALL_TEMPLATE flag. Intended to be used as iteration function.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList containing recalls, or NULL if not found

refsect2.title: ags_recall_find_type_with_recycling_context ()
refsect2.para: Finds next matching recall for type which has recycling_context , see AgsRecallId for further details about RecyclingContext. Intended to be used as iteration function.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList containing recalls, or NULL if not found

refsect2.title: ags_recall_find_recycling_context ()
refsect2.para: Finds next matching recall which has recycling_context , see AgsRecallId for further details about RecyclingContext. Intended to be used as iteration function.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList containing recalls, or NULL if not found

refsect2.title: ags_recall_find_provider ()
refsect2.para: Finds provider eg. AgsAudio or AgsChannel within GList containig AgsRecall.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList containing recalls, or NULL if not found

refsect2.title: ags_recall_find_provider_with_recycling_context ()
refsect2.para: Like ags_recall_template_find_provider() but given additionally recycling_context as search parameter.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GList containing recalls, or NULL if not found

refsect2.title: ags_recall_handler_alloc ()
refsect2.programlisting: AgsRecallHandler * ags_recall_handler_alloc (const gchar *signal_name, GCallback callback, GObject *data);

entry.para: the data to pass the callback

refsect2.title: ags_recall_add_handler ()
refsect2.para: Connect callback to recall specified by recall_handler .

refsect2.title: struct AgsRecallHandler
refsect2.para: A AgsRecallHandler acts as a callback definition

refsect2.title: The child property
refsect2.para: The child that can be added.

refsect2.title: The parent property
refsect2.para: The recall should be the parent instance of this recall.

refsect2.title: The cancel signal
refsect2.para: The ::cancel signal notifies about cancelling playback.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The child-added signal
refsect2.para: The ::child-added signal notifies about children added.

entry.para: the object to add the child

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The done signal
refsect2.para: The ::done signal notifies about stopping playback.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The duplicate signal
refsect2.programlisting: GObject* user_function (AgsRecall *recall, GObject *recall_id, gpointer n_params, gpointer parameter, gpointer user_data)

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The notify-dependency signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (AgsRecall *recall, guint dependency, gint count, gpointer user_data)
refsect2.para: The ::notify-dependency signal notifies about dependencies added.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

entry.para: the object to remove of audio loop

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The resolve-dependencies signal
refsect2.para: The ::resolve-dependencies signal notifies about resolving dependencies.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The run-init-inter signal
refsect2.para: The ::run-init-inter signal notifies about initializing stage 1.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The run-init-post signal
refsect2.para: The ::run-init-post signal notifies about initializing stage 2.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The run-init-pre signal
refsect2.para: The ::run-init-pre signal notifies about initializing stage 0.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The run-inter signal
refsect2.para: The ::run-inter signal notifies about running stage 1.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The run-post signal
refsect2.para: The ::run-post signal notifies about running stage 2.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The run-pre signal
refsect2.para: The ::run-pre signal notifies about running stage 0.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The stop-persistent signal
refsect2.para: The ::stop-persistent signal notifies about definitively stopping playback.

entry.simpara: user_data
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
